title: Acchi Kocchi (TV): Place=Princess
original_name: あっちこっち 第 13 話(未放送)「PLACE=PRINCESS」
opening_song: "Acchi de Kocchi de (あっちでこっちで)" by Acchi⇔Kocchi (あっち ⇔ こっち)
ending_song: "Te wo Gyu Shite ne (手をギュしてね)" by Tsumiki Miniwa (Rumi Ookubo)
sinopse: Episode 13 of Acchi Kocchi that was included in Vol.6.
